LanguageData.SleptInBedroom.stages.0.description: My bedroom is an awful place.

LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.0.label: awful barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.0.description: My barrack is an awful place, and I have to share it!
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.1.label: dull barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.1.description: I'm living in a dull barrack with other people.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.2.label: mediocre barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.2.description: My barrack is mediocre, and I have to share it too. I really don't like this.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.3.label: decent barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.3.description: My barrack is decent, but I really dislike sharing a sleeping space.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.4.label: slightly impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.4.description: My barrack is a nice place. But I really don't like sharing a room with others.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.5.label: impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.5.description: My barrack is impressive. It sucks that I have to share it, though.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.6.label: very impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.6.description: My barrack is very impressive. I'm annoyed I have to share it, though.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.7.label: extremely impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.7.description: My barrack is extremely impressive. It almost makes up for having to share it.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.8.description: My barrack is unbelievably impressive. I don't even mind sharing it.
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive barrack
LanguageData.SleptInBarracks.stages.9.description: My barrack is the best place one can ever imagine. It makes me happy, even sharing it.
